nodes.bodyText:
toJSONObject.
We could create a dedicated mapper for the json structure that JIRA expects.
Cast to string can be removed
This could be null, we should probably handle this if the JIRA api changes again
This should return a CreatedIssue and avoid overriding the instance (Maybe a static method or better an external mapper)
You can inject the StackConfiguration with @autowire since the manager imports it as a bean.
add the test prefix to test methods
